mdRecord.dcterms:title: Report of the Commission to locate the site of the frontier forts of Pennsylvania
Frontier forts of Pennsylvania
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert, George Dallas.
Buckalew, John M., 1826-
Commission to Locate the Site of the Frontier Forts of Pennsylvania.
Reynolds, Sheldon, 1845-1895
Richards, Henry Melchior Muhlenberg, 1848-1935
Weiser, Jay Gilfillan.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 2 v., col. plates, fold. map, plans (part fold.) 27 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contents.--v.1. The Indian forts of the Blue Mountains. By H.M. Richards. The frontier forts within the north and west branches of the Susquehanna River. By J.M. Buckalew. The frontier forts within the Wyoming Valley region. By S. Reynolds. The frontier forts in the Cumberland and Juniata valleys. By J.G. Weiser.--v.2. The frontier forts of western Pennsylvania. By G.D. Albert.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fortification--Pennsylvania.
Indians of North America--Pennsylvania.
Pennsylvania--History--Colonial period, ca. 1600-1775.
